new-version-key.summary: Professional summary tailored for this version. Should be 2-3 sentences highlighting relevant expertise and value proposition.

project_focus.Existing Project Title 2: Another version-specific description focusing on this version's priorities

another-version.summary: Different professional summary for another target audience or job type.

project_focus.Existing Project Title 1: Different angle for the same project

version_config.default_version: Key of the version to load by default
version_config.available_sections: All possible resume sections that can be used
version_config.skill_categories: All possible skill categories that can be referenced

version_fields.display_name: Human-readable name shown in version selector
version_fields.theme_color: Hex color code for this version's theme (e.g., #1976d2)
version_fields.summary: Professional summary text specific to this version
version_fields.skills_focus: Array of skill categories in display priority order
version_fields.sections_order: Array of resume sections in display order
version_fields.projects_limit: Maximum number of projects to show (integer)
version_fields.project_focus: Object mapping existing project titles to version-specific descriptions

best_practices.theme_colors: Use distinct, professional colors. Ensure good contrast for readability.
best_practices.summaries: Keep 2-3 sentences. Tailor language and keywords for target audience.
best_practices.skills_focus: Order by relevance to this version's target role.
best_practices.sections_order: Put most relevant sections first. Summary should always be first.
best_practices.project_focus: Don't change project content, just emphasize different aspects.
best_practices.validation: Use ConfigValidator to check your configuration before deploying.

adding_new_version: 1. Define your version key (lowercase, use hyphens)
2. Choose a unique theme color and appropriate icon
4. Order skills and sections by relevance
5. Create project descriptions emphasizing relevant aspects
6. Test the version in the browser
